sentences.sContent: Damien has always had a healthy disrespect (= that you think is good ) for media opinion.
sentences.sCn: 达米安对媒体的观点从来都持合理的不以为然的态度。

sentences.sContent: It was said on the spur of the moment and I meant no disrespect to anybody.
sentences.sCn: 我一时冲口而出，无意冒犯任何人。

sentences.sContent: No disrespect to Phil, but the team has performed better since he left (= used to show you are not criticizing someone ) .
sentences.sCn: 我无意对菲尔不敬，不过自从他离开后球队表现更好了。

words.tran: 无礼的；失礼的；不尊敬的

trans.tranOther: lack of respect for someone or something
